title: TomTom USA v1.11 By SponxorBlogspot

And since traffic data is provided every two minutes, you wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t have to worry about trying to get around a traffic jam only to run into another.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ Ã¢â‚¬â€œApp Advice

*** Great reasons to choose TomTom Navigation ***
Only the TomTom Navigation app offers all this:
- The most accurate TomTom maps in your pocket Ã¢â‚¬â€œ no mobile signal needed
- Daily free map updates wherever you are, via Map Share
- Reliable arrival times at all times of day with IQ Routes
- The quickest routes through traffic. Powered by TomTom HD Traffic (1)
- Powerful search with GoogleÃ¢â€žÂ¢, FacebookÃ¢â€žÂ¢ and foursquareÃ¢â€žÂ¢
- Clear turn-by-turn guidance while on the phone thanks to iOS Multitasking support
